nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to show information about call for help event.
@param _id uint - Event ID.
return title string - The title of the event.
return category string - The category of needed item.
return item string - The name of the item.
return amount uint - The amount of items needed.
return commited uint - The amount of items currently committed.
return borrow bool - True if the item is to be returned in the future.
return minimum uint - Minimum amount to pledge.
return endDate uint - End date of the event.
return ipfs string - The IPFS hash containing additional information about event.
return owner address - The owner of the event.
@notice Requires that the events exist.

nodes.name: getNeededCount

devdoc.details: Is a platform that Hospitals could utilize to connect & form alliance with other hospitals. Registered Hopitals in Kadena could call help & post/borrow essential items that they need at the moment or will be needing in the near future. Registered Hospital that has extra essential items could also post/give items that they think will be helpful to other hospitals. Every registered hospital in Kadena has a rating that corresponds to their actions on the platform. Some features/functions will be unavailable to a registered hospital if their rating drops a certain point.

callForHelp(string,string,string,uint256.details: Function creates the event to Call For Help.

params._amount: uint - The total amount of items needed.
params._borrow: bool - True if the items is expected to be returned in the future.
params._category: string - The category of the item.
params._ipfs: - The IPFS hash containing additional information about the event.
params._title: string - The title of the event.

callForHelpDetails(uint256).details: Function to show information about call for help event.

params._id: uint - Event ID. return title string - The title of the event. return category string - The category of needed item. return item string - The name of the item. return amount uint - The amount of items needed. return commited uint - The amount of items currently committed. return borrow bool - True if the item is to be returned in the future. return minimum uint - Minimum amount to pledge. return endDate uint - End date of the event. return ipfs string - The IPFS hash containing additional information about event. return owner address - The owner of the event.

getHospitalStatus(address).details: Function to show information about the hospital.

params._owner: address - The Ethereum Address of the hospital. return _hospitalName string - The name of the hospital. return _country string - The country where the hospital is located. return _city string - The city where the hospital is located. return _ipfs string - The IPFS hash containing additional information about event. return _pending bool - If true account has a pending registration. return _registered bool - If true account is registered. return _time uint - time of registration. return _rating uint - The rating of the account.

getNeededCount().details: Function returns number of all events.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

needsOf(address).details: Function to show events of the specified address.

params._owner: address - The address to query the events of.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pledge(uint256,uint256).details: Function to give item to the needed asstistance pool.

params._commit: - The amount of the item to commit.
params._eventId: - The ID of the Call for Help Event.

register(address,bool).details: Function to Accept/Reject or Revoke Registration .

params._accepted: - If true Ethereum Address Registration is accepted.
params._applicant: address - The Ethereum Address of the applicant.

params._city: string - The city where the hospital is located.
params._country: string - The country where the hospital is located.
params._ipfs: - The IPFS hash containing additional information about the Hospital.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

devdoc.title: KadenaNeed

callForHelp(string,string,string,uint256.notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the sender is registered.Requires that the event time is in the future.Requires that the sender rating is greater than or equal to 20.Requires that the amount is greater than 0.

pledge(uint256,uint256).notice: Requires that the event exist.Requires that the commit is greater than 0.Requires that the amount of items to give is <= total needed items in the pool.Requires that the amount of items to give is <= current needed items in the pool.Requires that the giver is not the creator of the event.Requires that the events hasn't ended yet.

register(address,bool).notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the approver is the owner of contract.Requires that the applicant address does not have a pending registration.

registerHospital(string,string,string,st.notice: Requires that the contract is not paused.Requires that the applicant address is not yet registered & does not have a pending registration.
